main.name: Ashish Siddhu
main.description: 6+ years of software development experience. Proficient in translating designs & wireframes into high-quality code and writing application interface code via JavaScript, ReactJS/Angular workflows. Adept at monitoring & maintaining frontend performance and troubleshooting & debugging the same to booster overall performance.
main.bio: Innovative Software Developer with 6+ years of experience with cutting edge frontend technologies. Proficient in new frameworks such as: ReactJs and Angular, and modern libraries like JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
main.contactmessage: I'd Love To Hear From You

education.school: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.project_1_description: VOD(Video-on-demand) is a media streaming application which runs on stateroom TVs of Carnival cruises, Princess Cruises, HAL & Seaborn cruise. This application is like Netflix, Amazon Prime and it provides vast number of films, documentaries and television programmes from a large catalogue. This application includes functionalities such as: Audio/Video playback, search content, bookmark, favorites,AutoPlay, Playlist, Live Video streaming & Responsiveness.
work.project_1_roles_2: Working as a Frontend lead of development team.
work.project_1_roles_4: Exclusively working on front end Modules using React.js,JavaScript, Redux, HTML5, CSS
work.project_2_description: Carnival MedallionNet is a web portal used by guests and crew onboard to access various onboard services and purchase internet plans.
work.project_2_roles_1: Designed entire UI of this application from scratch as a frontend Architect
work.project_2_roles_2: Created responsive website for desktop, mobile and tablets.
work.project_2_roles_4: Integrated different bundling strategies including webpack, grunt and gulp.

work.title: Software Analyst
work.project_1_description: Nedbank is South African bank, which offers banking services like insurance, asset management, and wealth management. The project was an insurance portal which enabled stronger customer relationships with an attractive, easy to use UI using AngularJs.
work.project_1_roles_1: Exclusively worked on payment gateway using auth tok

work.title: Software Developer
work.project_1_description: Axis Bank Limited is an Indian banking and financial services company. It sells financial services to large and mid-size companies. The project was a timesheet, billing and invoicing portal used by Axis bank employees.
work.project_1_roles_1: Implemented several reports using AngularJs, JavaScript and jQuery as per client requirements.
work.project_1_roles_2: Key resource of Development & Implementation team.
work.project_1_roles_3: Designed and developed an agent dashboard to manually reconcile exceptions.

testimonials.text: Ashish is a fantastic, hands on UI developer who has regularly delivered projects with seamless user experience. Whenever you want something front end, Ashish is the guy to look for. An asset to any team, he is always willing to work hard and help out his peers to learn and grow as well.
Ashish is knowledgeable, problem solver and a team player. One can always rely on him to came up with solutions at critical times
